name: deimosrising
text: Second appearance of sight lines, only appearance of the Scorpions.

name: apocowarg
text: I too was once a fan of haunting whistle solos.

name: rolotonybrowntown
text: when donald trump fires homeless pepole he gives them homes

name: stuart
text: Ray is correct. Many homeless people are Fired.

name: grayfox
text: "Oh shit, the Fuzz!"  Oh man I love that line.

name: mortshire
text:
THIS SHIT JUST GOT REAL.

(everyone on the planet should see Hot Fuzz)

name: ford
text: ...Twice!

name: soticoto
text: .... with sunglasses... indoors!

name: farqussus
text: at night

name: i_love_kate
text:
Whilst chewing toothpicks... and eating cornettos!

(An elaborate and daring feat.)

name: farqussus
text: while walking to the suuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuun

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Ach scheiss, Der Fuzzen!

name: sargasm
text: In Germany, it is illegal to profane Der Spiegel by such as wearing it for clothing.

name: mercuri0us
text: I love how he went to the liberty of making himself a tie.  That is dope.

name: mnemodomi
text: I hate that this is my reaction, but all I can think when I see this is how not a newspaper Der Spiegel is.

name: i_love_kate
text:
ARGH FUCK YOU YOU JUST RUINED THIS STRIP FOR ME.

At least it's not Das Bild. I'd hope that Ray wouldn't sully his body with that.

name: zem
text: It's unlike Ray to be down on himself.

name: senseihollywood
text: the Germans do not Fuck Around

name: taiiga
text: This is a really innovative way of dealing with homeless people. The western world could learn a lot from Germany (note: post WW2 germany only please)

name: norrin
text: So, did they throw him in the garbage? The first time I read it I thought he hid there, but now I am not sure.

name: taiiga
text: i really doubt ray would put himself into a garbage bag by free will. doesn't seem ballin' enough.

name: boyd
text: I don't see how one can compare The Scorpions and Venom. Totally different bands.

name: ttagxamm
text: Well yeah but I'll take the black-spotted, rotten apple of Venom, fit only to mashed up for hard cider and getting stoopid drunk, over the sweet, tangy orangeade of the Scorpions.

name: clever-nickname
text: I love the single "krink" emitted when Ray turns his head.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: Saw the Scorpions in Bangkok. Was rocked in such a way as a hurricane does.

name: biomusicologist
text: In case anyone's wondering, the guy in the pile of garbage is telling Ray to go away.

name: rocketman
text: we see ray's teeth in the first 2 panels

name: drago25
text: I feel the need to reiterate the sheer quality of Achewood's onomatopoeia. I mean, KRINK & KRINKLE? Music to my ears.. eyes

name: achilleselbow
text:
That's two Venom references I count (though I guess this would be the first one). Onstad must be a big fan.

I also don't understand why the police and Ray are inside garbage bags in the last panel. The fact that AV translated that sentence as "leave they" didn't help either.

name: biomusicologist
text: It is "DAMN! You [formal tone] go away!" 'Sie' can be somewhat confusing (especially to automatic internet translators) as it can be either singular or plural, but in this case, since the dude in the trash doesn't know Ray, I'm betting he'd use the formal rather than the familiar, not to mention that 'Sie' is capitalized here, which is not used for the "they" meaning. And it is not a policeman.

name: jimbob
text: Also, the police are not in the bags with Ray. They put him there, along with other streetsleepers.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Hah! Thank you. That is so quintessentially German. "Bag der trash up neat, Hans."

name: aperson
text: No I think he's just hiding from the police, behind those bags.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Thanks for stepping all over the funneh, Herr Reality.

name: aperson
text: Geh weg!

name: scorpio_nadir
text: No, You!

name: diggidy
text: I'm not sure I understand why Ray fears the police.  What has he done wrong?  Public drunkeness?  Taking too many free newspapers?

name: tttt2
text: Ray is presumptuous enough to assume the other guy stopped liking the Scorpions too

name: crankheart
text: oh jesus...the preface to my absolute favorite strip...

name: aramkolesar
text: Lay down your soul to the gods of rock and roll *huff puff* ARRRRRGH BLACK METAL

name: deusoma
text: "Oh shit, the Fuzz!" reminds me of a trip my brother took to New York where not only did he see a real live hustler selling imitation watches, but the guy also saw an approaching police car and cried "Oh fuck, it's the po-po!" before running away. It was apparently quite surreal for a young Canadian lad.

name: genequagmire
text: That bum is awfully polite.
